questions.question: Which psychologist proposed the Triangular Theory of Love, comprising intimacy, passion, and commitment?

options: Love can evolve and deepen over time.
There is only one 'soulmate' destined for everyone.

questions.question: According to Gary Chapman's 'The Five Love Languages,' which of the following is NOT one of the primary ways people express and receive love?

options: Complete emotional merging and loss of individuality
